trait.name: Brave
entries: Pierrick has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, Pierrick can regain 20 hit points.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: Pierrick rerolls a failed saving throw.

trait.name: Combat Superiority
entries: When the Pierrick hits with a weapon attack, he can choose one of the following effects to add to the attack:
{@italic Disarm.} The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or drop one object it is holding (Pierrick's choice).
{@italic Push.} The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from Pierrick.
{@italic Trip.} The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.
{@bold {@italic Purpose.}} Serve as a quest objective.
{@bold {@italic Trait.}} I am honorable and respectful to all, especially other fighters. (Virtue)
{@bold {@italic Personality.}} Honorable (I apologize, for I don't know this.)
{@bold {@italic Posture.}} Upstraight with arms held back.
{@bold {@italic Pfidget.}} Gesturing firmly with my hand.
